content: The GitHub Pages sites (https://hl7-fhir.github.io) is now redirecting to http://build.fhir.org/ . Please should out if you're having any issues or problems with this setup.
Looks like build.fhir.org is down - getting 404 Not Found right now.

OK, I can now download the full spec in under 2 sec:

$ time wget http://build.fhir.org/fhir-spec.zip
--2016-12-05 09:19:08--  http://build.fhir.org/fhir-spec.zip
Resolving build.fhir.org (build.fhir.org)... 174.129.20.244
Connecting to build.fhir.org (build.fhir.org)|174.129.20.244|:80... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK
Length: 211278672 (201M) [application/zip]
Saving to: ‘fhir-spec.zip’

100%[===================================================================================================>] 211,278,672  105MB/s   in 1.9s   

2016-12-05 09:19:10 (105 MB/s) - ‘fhir-spec.zip’ saved [211278672/211278672]

real    0m1.945s
user    0m0.060s
sys 0m0.650s

This is better :-)
pft. I can only dream of speeds like that
